title: FSJS Coordinator, Developer and Student Mentor
description: Promoted to the Full Stack JavaScript Techdegree.

bullets.heading: Current Job Stats
points: Design, create and collaborate on the software, programs, projects, and all supporting material for the Full Stack JavaScript Techdegree.
Review and debug student projects and mentor them through the learning process.
4,500+ front end and full stack student submitted projects reviewed.
Thousands of projects debugged.
Thousands of students mentored.
Create and experiment with new programs to promote student success and increase conversion and retention rates.
Create, curate and document team processes.
Help interview, hire and train new team members.
Review, track and report on Techdegree analytics.
Use GitHub, Mode, JIRA, Confluence, AWS s3 and Zoom.
